featured.title: TypeSpec First, AI Second: Building a Translation Service with Blueprint-Driven Development
featured.description: Learn how I built a complete audio translation and transcription service by combining TypeSpec for structured API design with AI-assisted development.

videos.title: TypeSpec First, Vibe Code Second
videos.description: In this demo, I introduce VibeSpec - a fun side project that demonstrates how to use TypeSpec as a foundation for more effective AI-assisted coding.

videos.title: TypeSpec 101
videos.description: First part in a series of tutorial videos on writing API specs using TypeSpec.

videos.title: Audio Alchemy - Translate and Transcribe with Azure OpenAI
videos.description: In this episode, Mario Guerra demonstrates how to translate and transcribe audio using Azure Cognitive Services and Azure OpenAI.
